amxsamples
Class Samples

Object
  amxsamples.Samples

public final class Samples
extends Object

Main class demonstrating a variety of MBean API (AMX) usages.

deploy

public void deploy(File archive)
            throws IOException
Deploy an archive.

To deploy, you will need an archive to deploy. A recommended sample may be found at: INSTALL_ROOT/samples/ejb/stateless/apps/simple.ear

This sample deploys the archive to the domain, but does not create any references to it, so it will not actually be associated with any server.

To associate an application with a server, use DeployedItemRefConfigCR.createDeployedItemRefConfig(java.lang.String, java.util.Map)

Throws:
IOException
See Also:
StandaloneServerConfig, DeployedItemRefConfigCR
